attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277079. BIG, BOLD AND READY FOR TOUGH TERRAIN - The all popular Ranger Wildtrack Automatic has arrived on our floor. So what's different - Chrome side steps, leather - trim, bigger dash board, leather wrapped steering wheel, orange hand stitching on the interior seats. Very luxurious and comfortable to take the long holiday trips as well. Boasting with a great 5 start safety raring as well, makes this bakkie very unique. We provide RWC upon delivery and we do a multi-point check on our vehicles for your peace of mind. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply
